## **hintsDeleteSpecificHint** {#hintsdeletespecifichint}
> hintsDeleteSpecificHint()

## **hintsSnapshot** {#hintssnapshot}
> Hints hintsSnapshot()

This will get a snapshot of all of the hints.

### Example

```typescript

}).catch((error: unknown) => console.error(error))
```
